def ispalindrome(n):
    p,x=n,n
    l=0
    while p!=0:
        p/=10
        l+=1
    p=0
    while l!=0:
        l-=1
        p=p+(x%10)*(10**l)
        x/=10
    if p==n:
        return 1
    return 0
t=int(input())
for i in xrange(1,t+1):
    k=int(input())
    while 1:
        k+=1
        if ispalindrome(k):
            break
    print k
